refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This VFS module is Peaxy's custom vfs.
The vfs_asroot module performs custom translation from NT ACL to POSIX Permission mode bits.
Please be aware that adding this module might have negative performance implications for large directories.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLES
refsect1.para: Performs custom translation from NT ACL to POSIX Permission mode bits.

refsect1.title: VERSION
refsect1.para: This man page is correct for version 4.3.8 of the Samba suite.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: The original Samba software and related utilities were created by Andrew Tridgell. Samba is now developed by the Samba Team as an Open Source project similar to the way the Linux kernel is developed.
